comments.en: 2 cartridges (color and black or color and photo)

The printer is more or less compatible to the Z42, but faster.

With the simple driver provided by Alwin Stolk one can at least print in up to 600x600 dpi (the 1200x600 dpi provided by the driver work only on the Z42). There is also preliminary support in GIMP-Print 4.1.99rc1 or newer.
